channel.title: Bibliographies on Adam Israel
channel.description: Recent content in Bibliographies on Adam Israel

item.title: Bibliography
item.description: Short Fiction January 2015 – “My City of Ruins” – Life After Ashes (reprint) January 2014 – “Aye of the Hagfish” – Goldfish Grimm’s Spicy Fiction Sushi July 2012 – “Man Out of Time” – Mad Scientist Journal March 2012 – “Control” – Goldfish Grimm’s Spicy Fiction Sushi December 2011 – “My City of Ruins” – Finding Home: Community in Apocalyptic Worlds September 2011 – “History of the Flesh” – Crimson Pact 2 April 2011 – “Dog Days” – Crossed Genres April 2011 – “Indigo’s Gambit” – Extinct Doesn’t Mean Forever July 2010 – “A Cup of Tea” – Golden Visions Magazine December 2008 – “Misdirected” – Return to Luna, Hadley Rille Books May 2008 – “That’s Just How I Roll” – Static Movement Non-Fiction Interviews Ted Chiang – Clarion Foundation Blog Stuart Boon – BookLifeNow Jay Lake – Inkpunks Inkpunks – A group blog of authors and editors.
